org.kiji.rest
Interface KijiClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagedKijiClient
public interface KijiClient

Interface for Kiji clients that are utilized by KijiREST resources.

Method Summary
 org.kiji.scoring.FreshKijiTableReader getFreshKijiTableReader(String instance, String table)
          Gets a FreshKijiTableReader.
 Collection<String> getInstances()
          Returns the names of the instances currently being served.

          Gets a Kiji table.

          Removes the table from the various table reader caches.
 

Method Detail

getKiji

org.kiji.schema.Kiji getKiji(String instance)
Gets a Kiji object for the specified instance. Caller should not release the Kiji instance.

Parameters:
instance - of the Kiji to request.
Returns:
Kiji object
Throws:
javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - if there is an error getting the instance OR if the instance requested is unavailable for handling via REST.

getInstances

Collection<String> getInstances()
Returns the names of the instances currently being served.

Returns:
the names of currently served instances.

getKijiTable

org.kiji.schema.KijiTable getKijiTable(String instance,
                                       String table)
Gets a Kiji table. Caller does not have to release the table as it will be released when the KijiClient is closed.

Parameters:
instance - in which this table resides
table - name of the requested table
Returns:
KijiTable object
Throws:
javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - if there is an error.

getKijiSchemaTable

org.kiji.schema.KijiSchemaTable getKijiSchemaTable(String instance)
Returns the Kiji schema table for the given instance. Caller should not close the schema table.

Parameters:
instance - is the instance for which the schema table should be retrieved.
Returns:
the schema table for the specified instance.

getFreshKijiTableReader

org.kiji.scoring.FreshKijiTableReader getFreshKijiTableReader(String instance,
                                                              String table)
Gets a FreshKijiTableReader. Caller should not close the fresh table reader.

Parameters:
instance - in which this table reader resides
table - name of the table to read
Returns:
FreshKijiTableReader object
Throws:
javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - if there is an error.

invalidateTable

void invalidateTable(String instance,
                     String table)
Removes the table from the various table reader caches. This happens when trying to read from a table that may have been deleted after KijiREST opened a reader for it.

Parameters:
instance - is the name of the instance.
table - is the name of the table to remove from the cache.
